author: guitargeek
body:
The direct inclusion of the `RooNLLVar.h` header will soon result in a warning with ROOT `master`.

Users will be encouraged to always use `RooAbsPdf::createNLL()` instead of instantiating the NLL-representing objects themselves.

Fortunately, the `RooNLLVar` was not used directly in CMSSW, so I'll suggest to get rid of some spurious includes now such that we don't get warnings in the ROOT `master` build soon.
title: Avoid including `RooNLLVar.h` in CMSSW
